briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of Caldolor (Intravenous Ibuprofen) in Hospitalized Adult and Pediatric Burn Patients
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial of Ibuprofen Injection (IVIb) for Treatment of Fever and Pain in Burn Patients
summary: The primary objective of this study of Caldolor administered to hospitalized adult and pediatric burn patients is to determine the efficacy of Caldolor on reducing fever when compared to placebo when administered every 6 hours for at least 24 hours.
